Title: FontForge: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in FontForge, the worst of
    which could result in the arbitrary execution of code.

Background.Text: FontForge is a PostScript font editor and converter.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in FontForge. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted font using FontForge, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All FontForge users should upgrade to the latest version:
